title: What are Elon Musk's sleep habits? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definite answer: I would describe it as Zen. Sleep when tired/needed. Meandering sarcastic answer that may have value: I liken Elon Musk’s sleep schedule to a series of short funerals. From reading many other questions on quora, I gather there are a lot of people who would swear that the “evil one” sleeps in a coffin. There are a whole lot of vague one-sided opinions (more like accusations) being used as implied premises to questions as if they are facts.
